name: Nintendo Switch Executable File
summary: Learn about .NRO files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can use a homebrew application or game (application or game developed by a user) on a Switch running Homebrew Launcher by copying the NRO executable file to the switch/â€‹ folder in the root of the Switch micro SD card. NRO files are named with the same name as the application or game it contains. The files are scanned by the Homebrew Launcher and display them in the menu.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
